subject: issue with the save file
description_text:
Hello,

i got the simsonn pro plus pedals for about 3 months now but i have a issue that everytime i close the app or restart my pc my loadcell KG and Elastomer choice in the save file reset hisself back to medium elastomers and 60kg while i´m using hard elastumers and always need to putit back to 70kg as i use 70kg loadcell pressure it is really anying to do this everytime i enter the rig i need to change that i tried previous version and newer versions of the simmson manager and keep getting this issue i deleted the software downloaded it again i keep having this issue

i hope there is a solution

conversations.body_text: Hi ricky Bekelaar,  Please take a clear photo of the side of the brake pedal and send it to us. Additionally, please confirm whether you are currently using SIMSONN Manager version 2.1.3.
